pages.text: The Blink Flower possesses ethereal, shimmering petals that seem to exist between dimensions. These fascinating plants occasionally appear to shift in and out of reality when observed.

Cultivation Notes:$(br)- Must be planted on Grove Soil$(br)- Goes through 3 growth stages: Seed → Bud → Bloom$(br)- Growth is accelerated during nighttime and in moonlight$(br)- When fully bloomed, will teleport entities that step on it to a random nearby location

pages.title: Seeds
pages.text: Blink Flower Seeds must be planted on Grove Soil. They grow best under moonlight, making nocturnal cultivation optimal for these dimensional plants.

pages.title: Bloom
pages.text: The harvested Blink Flower Bloom continues to exhibit unusual dimensional properties, occasionally shifting between dimensions. It is used to create Blink Spell Essence for teleportation magic.
